review: Dr Monga's clinic is an Ayurved speciality clinic "Medi" clinic  although he is an Allopathic doctor. This should be clearly mentioned in the clinic name. I reached the clinic for the appointment but a junior Ayurvedic doctor consulted me. On demanding that Dr. Monga meet me, Doctor Monga did eventually come out and apologise because he had some family emergency. But it was a frustrating experience and I felt like the clinic was scamming me. I had congestion and fever since last 3 days and needed an Allopathic doctor to examine me.

The doctor is not friendly and believes only the stories of his staff without corroborating the facts. A doctor is required to be friendly and understand the situation before jumping to conclusions. If his staff missed on including these charges, then it is not our fault. However, when reminded, we cleared the charges and the doctor's attitude was not professional at all. BAD EXPERIENCE!
